resource_description: Harmony Hacks is a student-driven platform designed to provide accessible resources, academic guidance, and career opportunities to high school and university students. By curating relevant content across various categories such as financial aid, technology, food programs, and more, the platform empowers learners to explore, grow, and connect within a supportive community. Whether you're preparing for college, navigating coursework, or seeking inspiration from mentors, Harmony Hacks aims to be your go-to hub for success. By curating relevant content across various categories such as financial aid, technology, food programs, and more, the platform empowers learners to explore, grow, and connect within a supportive community. Whether you're preparing for college, navigating coursework, or seeking inspiration from mentors, Harmony Hacks aims to be your go-to hub for success.

Safety Escorts - Safety Escorts are provided by UPD. Call 760-750-4567 to arrange for an escort. A Community Service Officer (CSO) will escort you to and from any campus building, parking lot, or residence hall. Live Scan services - by appointment. Lost & Found
